review: Everything was good. Product was brand new and works perfect. Plugged it in and it worked perfect with my television.
author: william brown

review: I thought this would be a great product to stream TV shows from my web browser since I am watching my favorite shows on the network websites on my computer.  The quality wasn't that great.  The voices weren't in sync with the lips which drives me crazy!  There was a constant choppy look to the screen as well.  Casting from the browser also made the picture choppy on my computer screen.  Once I stopped casting, my computer screen went back to normal so I knew it was Chromecast and not my computer.  I also have the fastest internet speed you can get with Comcast XFinity and even tested the speed which well surpassed streaming high quality video.  I am going to stick with Amazon Prime and Netflix using my Apple TV or PS3 and watching my network shows for free with my laptop.  (Cancelled cable recently so that is no longer an option.)
author: Stephen Ingalls "Steve Ingalls"

review: The Google Chromecast HDMI Streaming Media Player makes life so much easier!  All you have to do is plug the Chromecast into your TV and you'll have flawless access to Netflix (with a paid subscription), HBO Go (with a paid subscription) and YouTube.  It's really the only device you need to catch up on your favorite television shows or to share videos with a group on your TV instead of your computer.  My only complaint is that Amazon Instant Video does not work on the Chromecast.
